mapper.select: SELECT u.*, e.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u, (SELECT PUSER, AVG(EVAL_SCORE) USER_SCORE FROM EVAL, (SELECT USER_NO, RE_USER_NO FROM ADDRESS WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND (USER_NO = #{user_no} OR RE_USER_NO =#{user_no})) a WHERE PUSER = a.RE_USER_NO OR PUSER = a.USER_NO GROUP BY PUSER ) e WHERE u.USER_NO = e.PUSER AND u.USER_NO != #{user_no}

SELECT u.*, e.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u, (SELECT PUSER, AVG(EVAL_SCORE) USER_SCORE FROM EVAL, (SELECT USER_NO, RE_USER_NO FROM ADDRESS WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND (USER_NO = #{user_no} OR RE_USER_NO =#{user_no})) a WHERE PUSER = a.RE_USER_NO OR PUSER = a.USER_NO GROUP BY PUSER ) e WHERE u.USER_NO = e.PUSER AND u.USER_NO != #{user_no} AND u.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{user_name} || '%'
